title: (x) Plastique Magazine logo & titling face - H&FJ Akropolis, Rhode Cond {Yves, Hanno Bennert}
content:
Any idea what these heavy weighted faces are? Thanks for looking.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Plastique_6013.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211641im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Plastique_2_3824.png)
author: apparatus™

comments.content: The bottom one is [H&FJ Akropolis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211641/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100000&itemID=200029&cpuCount=) from [Jonathan Hoefler](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211641/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jonathan%20Hoefler)'s wonderful [Proteus Project](http://web.archive.org/web/20150308211641/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100019).
this is crazy! I was looking for exactly the same font right now! I was about to post the same image now. So, thanks too.
